title: The City of lost children [DVD]
creator_credit: Jean-Pierre Jeunet, Marc Caro, Claudie Ossard, France 3 Cinema, Studio Canal+ and Lumière
brief_description: An extraordinary film from the makers of “Delicatessen”. Krank lives on a lonely oil rig in a swirling sea. He cannot dream and is aging prematurely so he kidnaps young children hoping to steal their sleeping thoughts. On a quest to find his young brother, a fairground strongman called One sets off on a series of fantastical adventures to rescue the lost children.
